meanings.definition: To replace the carpet in a room or building.
meanings.sent1: We are recarpeting the living room this weekend.
meanings.sent2: The hotel is recarpeting all the rooms to give them a fresh look.
meanings.sent3: Recarpeting the office will make it feel like a brand new space.
meanings.sent4: She felt like recarpeting her life with new experiences and adventures.
meanings.sent5: The process of recarpeting can transform the entire atmosphere of a room.

meanings.definition: The act of putting down new carpet.
meanings.sent1: The recarpeting of the office was completed ahead of schedule.
meanings.sent2: Recarpeting can make a room feel cozy and inviting.
meanings.sent3: The recarpeting project turned into a fun team-building activity.
meanings.sent4: The recarpeting of the library was like giving it a warm hug.
meanings.sent5: The recarpeting process involved choosing the perfect shade and texture for the space.
